product_name: Bodyglide For Her Pocket-Size Anti-Chafing Skin Protectant - Package of 3
long_description: Carry Bodyglide for Her(TM) pocket-size anti-chafing skin protectant with you wherever you go. It creates an invisible barrier on your skin to prevent blisters and chafing. Pocket-size sticks of Bodyglide for Her are easy to take along on any trip. All natural formula is fragrance-free, petroleum-free, hypoallergenic, water- and sweat-resistant, nongreasy and non-staining. Easily glides on like a solid deodorant so there's no mess or handwashing necessary after applying. Apply to bra line, thighs, neck, feet or any other place that rubs. Bodyglide for Her(TM) pocket-size anti-chafing skin protectant contains aloe vera and vitamin E to moisturize skin. Package of 3.
short_description: Carry Bodyglide for Her(TM) pocket-size anti-chafing skin protectant with you wherever you go. It creates an invisible barrier on your skin to prevent blisters and chafing.
